message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_RECOMMENDATION_XRV_NO_HEAD_OF_HOUSEHOLD
message.locale: Head of Household evidence must be entered.

message.locale: Household Member evidence must be recorded.

message.name: ERR_HHOLDMEMBER_XRV_GENDER_RECORD_EVIDENCE_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: Gender evidence must be recorded for %1s.

message.locale: Marital Status evidence must be recorded for %1s.
يجب تسجيل دليل الحالة الاجتماعية إلى 1s%.

message.name: ERR_HHOLDMEMBER_XRV_BIRTH_AND_DEATH_EVIDENCE_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: Birth and Death evidence must be recorded for %1s.
يجب تسجيل دليل الميلاد والوفاة إلى 1s%.

message.name: ERR_CLEAR_OUTSTANDING_VERIFICATION
message.locale: Please clear outstanding verifications before approval.
